entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
